    @Service
public class StorageServiceImpl

    • Method Detail

      • storeToDisk

        public String storeToDisk(String registrationId,
                          byte[] packet)
                   throws RegBaseCheckedException
        Description copied from interface: StorageService
        The packet will be stored to the configured location in the local system.

        The input encrypted registration packet will be Base64 encoded using CryptoUtil and then the encoded packet will be stored to the configured local storage under a folder. The name of the folder will be current date in configured format.

        The configured storage location and date pattern will be taken form the global params using ApplicationContext map.

        Returns the location where packet had been stored.

        Specified by:
        storeToDisk in interface StorageService
        Parameters:
        registrationId - the id of the Registration
        packet - the encrypted packet data to be stored in local storage
        Returns:
        the file path where the files had been stored
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - any exception while saving the encrypted packet
